description: Control of construction activity and traffic (Condition 4); Land contamination (Condition 5 1.(a) (b) (c)); Air Quality condition (1) (condition 10); Air Quality condition (2) (Condition 11); Condition 12 (Air Neutral Assessment): Demolition of 6no. vehicle garage building. Erection of a three storey prefabricated modular building comprising of 30no. (total) temporary accommodation units for homeless households (Sui Generis Use) with associated access, car parking, refuse/cycle storage, landscaping including play area and services for the temporary period of 10 years. (Summary)
decision_conditions: in accordance with plans Air Quality Assessment 120 Chigwell Road, South Woodford; REC reference: AQ104288R1, report prepared for JDA Architects; Date: November 2017 written by REC; Air Quality Assessment 120 Chigwell Road, South Woodford REC Reference: AQ104288R2, report prepared for Elliot Group Limited Date: October 2018 written by REC; Construction Phase Plan (Health and Safety) For Living Accommodation at Chigwell Road for London Borough of Redbridge Rev:01-19th September 2018 (CPP [H&S] Rev: 01 for S170103); Site location plans; 18.014/Phasel/1 (Site Location Plan); 18.014/Phasel/2 (BGS Geology and Borehole Location Plan); 18.014/Phasel/2 (Relevant Feature Plan); 919j A 002 Rev A (Proposed Site Plan); Appendix D: Risk Assessment Calculation; A Phase 1 desk study to support a residential development at Chigwell Road, Redbridge, E18 1NN, by A F Howland Associates Limited for Elliott Group Limited; (Reference: DJM/18.014/PhaseI) dated February 2018; A Ground Investigation Report for an Emergency Residence at: Chigwell Road, Redbridge, E18 1NN by A F Howland Associates Limited for Elliott Group Limited (Reference CPJS/18.014) dated 19th March 2018; A Remediation Strategy for the Demolition of 6No. Vehicle Garage Buildings and Erection of Three Storey prefabricated Modular Building at 120 Chigwell Road, South Woodford, Redbridge, London, E18 1NN, (Reference CPJS/18.014/RMS/Rev03) dated 19 November 2018 prepared by AF Howland Associates Limited
